es-ES.summary: Reproduce música de YouTube Music en tu Alexa
examplePhrases: Alexa, reproducí Wonderwall en YouTube Music
es-ES.name: YouTube Music
es-ES.description: Reproduce tu música favorita de YouTube Music directamente en tu dispositivo Alexa. Busca canciones, artistas, álbumes y reproduce tus playlists favoritas.

en-US.summary: Play YouTube Music on your Alexa device
examplePhrases: Alexa, play Wonderwall on YouTube Music
en-US.name: YouTube Music
en-US.description: Play your favorite music from YouTube Music directly on your Alexa device. Search for songs, artists, albums and play your favorite playlists.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: To test this skill, say 'Alexa, abre YouTube Music' or 'Alexa, open YouTube Music'
